did.unittitle: ILR School Extension Division Additional Files

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations (NYSSILR)

did.abstract: Files of Alpheus Smith regarding the Wilhelm Weinberg Labor-Management Seminar at the New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations (NYSSILR), 1957-1960.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183> kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Alpheus Smith (March 29, 1898 - January 23, 1977) became a professor in the School of Industrial and Labor Relations at Cornell University in 1946. During his time at NYSSILR, he taught courses in human relations, directed the Extension Division, and at the time of the Labor-Management conference in 1959, served as Chairman of the University Seminar Committee. He retired from Cornell University in 1966.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Labor-Management Seminar entitled "Our Changing Society: Problems and Opportunities for Labor and Management," hosted by Cornell University's New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations (NYSSILR) from October 25-30, 1959, was supported by the Estate of Wilheim Weinberg.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of files of Alpheus Smith regarding the the Labor-Management Seminar entitled "Our Changing Society: Problems and Opportunities for Labor and Management," hosted by Cornell University's New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations (NYSSILR) from October 25-30, 1959.
Included are planning documents, announcements, correspondence, and budget materials relating to the seminar.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: ILR School Extension Division Additional Files #/4152. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Post-seminar correspondence; certificates; housekeeping arrangements; biographies; materials handed out during seminar
